description: Java class representing a Product entity for an e-commerce or catalog system, with fields for id, name, price, and quantity, including validation constraints and JPA annotations.

classes.name: Product
classes.description: Entity class mapped to 'products' table with fields for id, name, price, and quantity, including validation constraints and JPA annotations.

methods.name: Product(String name, BigDecimal price, Integer quantity)
methods.description: Constructor to initialize a Product with specified name, price, and quantity.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the product.

methods.name: getName()
methods.description: Returns the name of the product.

methods.name: setName(String name)
methods.description: Sets the name of the product.

methods.name: getPrice()
methods.description: Returns the price of the product.

methods.name: setPrice(BigDecimal price)
methods.description: Sets the price of the product.

methods.name: getQuantity()
methods.description: Returns the available quantity of the product.

methods.name: setQuantity(Integer quantity)
methods.description: Sets the available quantity of the product.
